statements: DELETE FROM EmergencyResponseTimes WHERE emergency_type = 'Fire' AND response_time < 10
DELETE FROM EmergencyResponseTimes WHERE emergency_type = 'fire' AND response_time > 10;
DELETE FROM response_times WHERE emergency_type_id = 2 AND response_time_seconds > 300;
DELETE FROM emergencies WHERE emergency_type = 'Fire' AND response_time_in_seconds > 300;
DELETE FROM reports WHERE resource_id = 101 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM resource_allocation WHERE emergency_id = 3 AND date_time < '2022-01-01';
